title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 416.3 - Fishing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 416.3 - Fishing

State Regulations

No person shall engage in fishing, spearing or netting in
any park except at such times and in such places when such use shall be
permitted and then only by persons lawfully licensed by the

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
416.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
